ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Get this if the enemy team casts spells a lot.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good early HP regen when you get low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Allows you to heal up after harassed.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Gives DPS which you need. Keep them on intelligence (blue).
ItemTooltips.null_talisman: Gives good stats that you need.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: A great disable and gives you good damage.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Good item if you do not have a lot of gold.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Allows you to do more damage as well as position better.
ItemTooltips.dagon: If you need a lot of magic damage get this.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get this to not get stunned.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Gives you damage and armor. Has a strong active in team fights.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Gives lots of damage and HP. Active is a great slow.

AbilityTooltips.obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb: Gives lots of damage once you have a large Mana pool. Helps last hitting early.
AbilityTooltips.obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment: Allows you to steal intelligence as well as trap heroes for more kills.
AbilityTooltips.obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura: Lets you keep on casting without worrying about Mana.
AbilityTooltips.obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse: Powerful damage dealing spell, try to save it for team fights.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these once you have to.
